title: For the Context object received on notification of an EventListener, dataImporter field could be exposed
description:
Hello,

We are registering an EVentListener for the data import end event and it would be very helpful to reach the information concerning the status of the data importer through the context object received.

dataImporter in unfortunatelly a private field in ContextImpl and there is no getter in order to reach to it.
It would be helpful to be able to reach to dataImporter.getStatusMessages()

The workaround right now is to send another http request to get this information.

Thank you in advance,
Andreea Ardelean
